titles.title: A bill to authorize Pacific Historic Parks to establish a commemorative display to honor members of the United States Armed Forces who served in the Pacific Theater of World War II, and for other purposes.
Admiral Lloyd R. "Joe" Vasey Pacific War Commemorative Display Establishment Act
Admiral Lloyd R. Joe Vasey Pacific War Commemorative Display Establishment Act
Admiral Lloyd R. "Joe" Vasey Pacific War Commemorative Display Establishment Act
Admiral Lloyd R. Joe Vasey Pacific War Commemorative Display Establishment Act
Admiral Lloyd R. "Joe" Vasey Pacific War Commemorative Display Establishment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 115-215.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 359.

bill.summary:
Admiral Lloyd R. "Joe" Vasey Pacific War Commemorative Display Establishment Act
This bill authorizes the Pacific Historic Parks to establish and maintain a commemorative display to honor the members of the U.S. Armed Forces and Allies who served in the Pacific Theater during World War II.
Federal funds may not be used to design, procure, prepare, install, or maintain the commemorative display, but the National Park Service may accept and expend contributions of non-federal funds and resources for such purposes.
